Description: Footed cylindrical vase of hippopotamus ivory with a small ledge rim.
Curator's comments: Published: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, 'Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna' (London, 1911), 21, 33, pl. xx.3 centre. The vase originally had two small loop handles. The walls are thin and well cut. Pieces probably belonging to this vessel are registered as EA 49012.
